content: My sister Maya has cerebral palsy. She needs help with everything - bathing, eating, getting dressed. Our parents used to care for her, but they died two years ago. Now it's just me. I'm 27. I should be building my career, dating, living my life. Instead I'm changing adult diapers and fighting with Medicaid.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc16Rtvt8FM4TuNNLCoB"}]

I haven't grieved. I couldn't. The funeral was on Monday, and by Wednesday I had to figure out Maya's care schedule. Social services wanted to put her in a group home. But my parents made me promise I'd keep her with me. So I quit my teaching job and became a full-time caregiver.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc16uZppSUmE2m5TXHcM"}]

Teaching was everything. I had a program for underprivileged kids - free music lessons, instruments we'd repair together. I was building something. Now it's gone. Someone else took over the program. My kids sent me a video last month saying they missed me. I cried for three days.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc17NzqBokniPG4cZUGa"}]

No one. I don't have family here. My friends from college are all married, having kids, traveling. I haven't been on a date in two years. Who wants to date someone whose life revolves around caregiving? Who has no money, no career, no time? I'm invisible.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc17rbWTDmpQ9UYBFhdD"}]

I looked for support groups. Everything I found was for parents of disabled kids or adult children caring for elderly parents. I'm a 27-year-old Black man caring for my adult sister. I don't fit anywhere. Even sibling caregiver groups are mostly women.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc18KzXzWveLUxQcm4EF"}]

Feeling seen would be... someone acknowledging that I love my sister AND I'm angry this is my life. That I can honor my parents' wishes AND resent the promise I made. That I'm not a bad person for wanting my own life. Everyone acts like I'm either a saint or secretly resenting Maya. But it's both. All the time.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc18ozXCUL3pEDBhTjM1"}]

Maya knows. She's intellectually disabled, but she's not oblivious. She asked me last week if I was mad at her. I said no. But I think she knows I'm unhappy. That makes me feel even worse - like I'm traumatizing her with my grief.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc19HYiSof7iuYBgEfnY"}]

Maybe we could grieve together. I've been so focused on protecting her, I forgot she lost them too. Maybe I need to stop being her caregiver for a minute and just be her brother. The brother who also misses Mom and Dad.

[ERROR: Failed to call model anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5 after 3 attempts: 401 Client Error: Unauthorized for url: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages | Response: {"type":"error","error":{"type":"authentication_error","message":"invalid x-api-key"},"request_id":"req_011CUc19m5gKRnUnSNo5kspw"}]
